sections.heading: authorized.The commission, in accordance with the State Park System Construction Alternatives Act, may solicit and execute a design-build contract or a construction manager-general contractor contract for a public project in the state park system

sections.text:
37-1718.Contracts authorized.

The commission, in accordance with the State Park System Construction Alternatives Act, may solicit and execute a design-build contract or a construction manager-general contractor contract for a public project in the state park system.

SourceLaws 2018, LB775, ยง 19.
